meanings: beat[crush] the enemy at a blow

vlive.korean: 여러분들에게 해찬이 갤러리 보는 V LIVE일 거라고... I don't think I said that today's V LIVE will be about gallery of HAECHAN... 듣기 View video NCT : 같이만드는 해찬캠💚
vlive.english: I don't think I said that today's V LIVE will be about gallery of HAECHAN...

vlive.korean: ['뭐지?'일 거라고 상상도 못 함!] - 나 뭐였지? - 저는 그리고... [Never thought "what" could be the word!] - What was it? - And I... 듣기 View video M2 : [Full] TOMORROW X TOGETHER Comeback Show
vlive.english: [Never thought "what" could be the word!] - What was it? - And I...

vlive.korean: 이시'언'일 거라곤 상상 가능하고? You could imagine it would be Lee Sieon? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 학교에 우리에 대한 소문이 돈다 [연애미수] EP02 좋아하는 사람이 있으니까.
vlive.english: You could imagine it would be Lee Sieon?

vlive.korean: 막 올림픽에 나가는 그런... 너무 감동적 일 거 같은... from Leap Studio to go out on the Olympics... It will be so moving... 듣기 View video Leap Now by Yeonjae Son : EP 01. ROPE, 연결의 끈 <연재, 다시 시작합니다>
vlive.english: from Leap Studio to go out on the Olympics... It will be so moving...

vlive.korean: 우정들은 뭐 일 거 같아요? What do you think it is, UJUNG? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [수빈 여름] 뚜름의 예술뽐내기🎨 Ep.01
vlive.english: What do you think it is, UJUNG?

examples.korean: I know it’s here somewhere! 발음듣기 틀림없이 그게 여기 어디 일 거야! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I know it’s here somewhere! 발음

examples.korean: Probably cuz red bleeds. 발음듣기 아마도 빨간색 물이 빠져서 일 거야. DARAKWON
My next smartphone will be a slider smartphone. 발음듣기 내 다음 스마트폰은 슬라이딩 스마트폰 일거야. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: My next smartphone will be a slider smartphone. 발음

examples.korean: The party guests ate up all the snacks at one fell swoop. 발음듣기 그 파티에 온 손님들은 과자를 일거에 먹어치웠다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The party guests ate up all the snacks at one fell swoop. 발음

examples.korean: I didn't do very well in this exam. I think I would get C+ for the most part. 발음듣기 이번 시험은 망쳤어. 잘해야 C+ 일거야. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I didn't do very well in this exam. I think I would get C+ for the most part. 발음
